description: A dashboard for the CoreDNS DNS server with updated metrics for version 1.7.0+.  Based on the CoreDNS 1.7.0+ dashboard by ejkinger

targets.expr: (sum(rate(coredns_cache_requests_total{scb_k8s_name=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", app_kubernetes_io_instance="node-local-dns", zones=~"sovcombank.*"}[5m])) - sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{scb_k8s_name=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", type="success", app_kubernetes_io_instance="node-local-dns", zones=~"sovcombank.*"}[5m]))) / sum(rate(coredns_cache_requests_total{scb_k8s_name=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", app_kubernetes_io_instance="node-local-dns", zones=~"sovcombank.*"}[5m]))

title: Node-Local-Dns
